gettingStarted.desc: NadbaOTP provides a simple REST API for sending and verifying OTP codes via WhatsApp. Follow these steps to integrate OTP verification into your application.
gettingStarted.step1: Create an account and get your API key
gettingStarted.step3: Make your first API call to send an OTP
gettingStarted.step4: Verify the OTP code from your user

auth.desc: All API requests require authentication using a Bearer token. Include your API key in the Authorization header.
auth.securityDesc: Never expose your API key in client-side code. Always make API calls from your server.

sendOtp.desc: Send a one-time password to a WhatsApp number.

verifyOtp.desc: Verify an OTP code submitted by the user.

rateLimits.desc: API rate limits are applied per API key to ensure fair usage.
